attributes.action: Make compulsory for all schoolchildren over 14 years the reading and understanding of 1984 by George Orwell
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reading of this book by schoolchildren would help to make them aware of the dangers of totalitarianism spawned from either right or left wing ideologies.

How can this be party political e petitions team?....unless of course you are saying that 1984 represents the present government policy. I am not.
